title: MCPE build 8 更新日志
author: kaho
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kaho 于 2014-6-25 22:07 编辑 

Bug Fixes:
Bug 修复：

- Fixed two crashes in furnace
- 修复了在熔炉的两个崩溃
- Fixed an infinite loop (game would hang) when loading a world with a fully empty column
- 修复了当加载一个世界的一个完全空列时，游戏会无线加载（游戏会一直挂住）
- You can now interact with all blocks again
- 现在，你可以与所有的方块互动
- Grass now correctly spreads to dirt blocks again
- 草现在可以正确地散播草去其他泥土方块
- Immersive mode should now work correctly
- 身临其境模式现在会正确地工作
- Fixed wolves not remembering their sit state
- 修复狼不会记住他们的静坐状态
- Leaves don't turn to wood anymore
- 树叶再也不会转成木头了
- Furnaces now show the progressbar when moving items again
- 当正在再次移动物品时，熔炉现在会显示进度条
- Now using the correct spawn location for old worlds
- 现在旧地图（存档）会有正确的重生位置
- Mobs don't run at you anymore in Creative
- 在创造模式，怪物再也不会跑
- Zombies and Spiders now use the new AI
- 僵尸和骷髅现在正在使用新的 AI

Tweaks:
调整：

- Faster texture loading (should not get stuck anymore)
- 更快的材质加载（应该不会再卡住了）
- We no longer write the player tag to level.dat
- 我们再也不会在 level.dat 里写上玩家资料
- Enderman damage is now the same as PC
- 安得现在的伤害与PC是一样的

Known Bugs:
已知Bugs：

- Sometimes chunks only containing transparent blocks don't render until interacted with
- 除非你与该方块有互动，否则有时候只含有透明的方块不渲染
- Sometimes entities degenerate into strange bunches of triangles?
- 有时候实体会退化成三角形的奇怪串
- Crafting screen still have some bugs with duplication bugs and stuff
- 合成画面依然有一些bug，例如重叠的bug和类似的东西
- You can still place a block where you are standing
- 你仍然可以在你站立的位置放置一个方块
- Torch destruction particles still have black borders
- 火炬破坏颗粒仍然有黑边



如翻译不准，请见谅！

原文：http://plus.google.com/105412738026646967654/posts/9ZUCy3fdaZW
